## UtilitiesService.uploadFile() method

Upload File Upload a \_small\_ file to a NERSC system.

- \*\*machine\*\*: the name of the machine to use - \*\*path\*\*: the remote path of the file - \*\*file\*\*: the file uploaded from your local machine

**Signature:**

```typescript
uploadFile(machine: PublicHost, path: string, formData: UploadFileBody): CancelablePromise<UploadResult>;
```
